content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's a nice flavor of a recursion exercise

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Well put together.  I'd probably move it to easy.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Test cases work well, statement is wide and clear with nice examples.

More test cases would be much welcome, since first two of them are warm up 3x3

I would replace "The value of each cell is the sum of the digits of the row index and the sum of the digits in the column index." by "The value of each cell is the sum of the digits of the row index and  the digits in the column index.".
Or you could say "The value of each cell is the sum of the digits of the row index
plus the sum of the digits in the column index."
Since the robot begins on cell (0,0) whose value is 0, I would replace the range "-100 <= T <=100" by "0 ≤ T ≤100".

Please refer to the example in the contribution guidelines:
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement#guidelines
and follow its presentation used in the Input and Output sections. In particular, please include line numbers and variable types.

Please also refer to the above guidelines and format all the variables in all the sections.

I suggest to remove the title in the Goal section.

"robots threshold" should be amended as "robot's threshold" (Goal section and Input section).

Thanks.
Thanks for these - incorporated your feedback.  LMK if I happened to miss something.
Thanks!  Updated to accept both of these suggestions.
Added 1 more test case to fail for those that simply visit all cells and check if cell val is less or equal to T.
